price: Kuma dã Munã so lalle ne dã Mun sanya malã'iku, daga ci, kinku, a cikin ƙasa, sunã mayẽwa*
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ
footnotes: * Dã Mun so dã Mun sanya ɗiyansu su zama malã'iku, su fi Ĩsa ɗan Maryama zama abin mãmãki ga halitta, sa'an nan su maye muku a cikin ƙasã maimakon ɗiya masu siffõfi irin na jikunkunanku. Zai fi zama abin mãmãki mutum yahaifi malã'ika bisa mace ta haifi ɗã bã da wani namiji yã kusance ta ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lajaʿalnā minkum malāikatan fī al-arḍi yakhlufūna
